text: Soul is a 2020 American computer-animated comedy movie produced by Walt Disney Pictures and Pixar Animation Studios that has been released by Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures. It was directed by Pete Docter. It stars Jamie Foxx, Tina Fey, Questlove, Phylicia Rashad, Daveed Diggs, and Angela Bassett. Soul was released on December 25, 2020 on Disney+. It won the Academy Award for Best Animated Feature in 2021. ==References== Category:2020 movies Category:2020 comedy movies Category:2020 computer-animated movies Category:Pixar movies Category:Disney+ movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Academy Award winning movies
title: Soul (2020 movie)
